description: Take classic chicken parmigiana flavours and give them a twist. Pre-crumbed chicken schnitzels are cooked with feta, tomatoes and pasta in this hearty pasta bake.
keywords: Pasta bake,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Jun 2021,Winter,Autumn,Tomato,Low sugar,Chicken
name: Parmigiana Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g marinated feta in oil, drained, reserving cup oil
1 bunch basil, leaves picked, stems finely chopped
500g pkt Woolworths RSPCA- approved chicken schnitzels

recipeInstructions.text: Place tomatoes, paste, feta, basil stems and 1/4 cup feta oil in a large baking dish, tossing to combine. Place chicken over tomato mixture and bake for 20 minutes or until tomatoes have softened and chicken is cooked through.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling, salted water according to packet instructions. Drain.

Preheat grill to high. Remove chicken from dish and transfer to a large plate. Add pasta to dish and stir to combine. Arrange chicken on top of pasta mixture. Top chicken with cheese and drizzle with remaining feta oil.
Grill for 5 minutes or until cheese is golden and has melted. Season with pepper and serve scattered with basil leaves.
